title: AI Bamboo Plant
description: Using a water sensor, the bamboo plant will use AI (LLaMA running on local server) to write an insulting speech about me neglecting to water the plant and plays on the speaker using AI text-to-speech. Video in GitHub README.

title: AI GitHub Actions Workflow Analyzer
description: Implemented a RAG workflow in an AI agent that analyzes GitHub Actions workflows. This workflow identifies failures and suggests potential solutions using the workflow logs and source code.

title: Ross Video FPGA Challenge - Frame Out
description:
Wrote a Python script to convert gif to frames that can be interpreted in a simulated ROM of a FPGA. Assisted in displaying outputted videos using SystemVerilog. Winning Team.

Devpost Submission

title: Docs Chatbot
description: Developed and deployed an LLM for an assistant that helps developers navigate Solace Documentation. Winning team of an internal hackathon at Solace.

title: Wallpaper Theme Converter
description:
A website that converts any image to any colour palette using JavaScript.

Used by many enthusiasts with 100+ stars on GitHub.

Try Wallpaper Theme Converter

title: AI Capstone Project
description: My capstone project that uses RAG and a multi-agent framework to retrieve data and answer sophisticated questions. May be deployed for usage by the client. Contact for more information

title: Liam Carney's Website
description:
Created a portfolio website for my musician friend, with interactive animations/elements for the discography section.

Visit Liam's Website

title: ForPaws
description:
I created a group with intentions to learn about web development, called MeowDev.

Forpaws is the first project, aimed to make a social media for pet owners to share media revolving around their pets.

title: Midi Search
description: A command-line interface that searches and downloads MIDI files from archive.org.
